User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://rusoft.com.ar/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay
Crawl-delay: 1

# Disallow admin areas (if any)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_nuxt/
Disallow: /node_modules/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /
Allow: /servicios
Allow: /nosotros
Allow: /contacto
Allow: /portafolio
Allow: /cv
